doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Ahmmad Taous
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Ahmmad Taous is a ENT Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, MS (ENT). He is a Professor & Head, Department of ENT at Pabna Medical College & Hospital. He is a medical researcher and has rich international credential, and Editor of some medical journal, councillor of Bangladesh medical and dental council-BMDC. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Ahmmad Taous at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 4.30pm to 7pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 12pm (Friday).
